listPage.title: Our Projects
listPage.description: From corporate websites to dynamic mobile applications and engaging UI/UX designs, we've developed a wide range of projects for clients across various industries.

contactSection.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contactSection.description: If you have a new project in your mind, let us know and we will get back to you with a comprehensive proposal.

footer.companyDescription: Two Wings is a digital agency that helps businesses grow online.

projects.title: Six Flags – Qiddiya City
projects.shortDescription: An immersive landing experience for Six Flags Qiddiya City, the first Six Flags park in the Middle East.
projects.fullDescription: An innovative land for a great race for Six Flags Qiddiya City. The first Six Flags park in Saudi Arabia. Developed with Cursor was a big step. It was a new idea for the project, where we developed all the sections including the logo, the slider and awesome animations.
projects.overview: An overview of the vision, scope, and objectives of the project.
projects.problem: The problem statement regarding the challenges faced, existing pain points, or deficiencies. This section outlines the issues that were faced, challenges, and details about the situation.
projects.solution: An explanation describing how the project solves the problem. This could include innovative approaches, new technologies, or improved processes that were implemented to provide value.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality digital experiences that align with our client's vision and drive measurable results.

todayWork.title: Today's Work
todayWork.description: A showcase of our latest design and development work for Six Flags Qiddiya City.

projects.title: My Sport Time
projects.shortDescription: A multi-platform sports management ecosystem consisting of two panels and native mobile apps.
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive sports management platform with admin and user panels, plus native iOS and Android applications for athletes and organizers.
projects.overview: A full-stack sports management solution designed to streamline event registration, scheduling, and participant communication.
projects.problem: Sports organizations needed a unified platform to manage multiple events, handle registrations, and communicate with participants across web and mobile.
projects.solution: We built a scalable ecosystem with role-based dashboards, real-time updates, and native mobile apps for the best on-the-go experience.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We committed to a user-first design and robust backend that could scale with growing user bases and event complexity.

todayWork.title: Today's Work
todayWork.description: Ongoing enhancements to the mobile apps and admin panel based on user feedback.

projects.title: Jesus Revival Church
projects.shortDescription: A faith-centered website designed to share religious events, community news, and streaming content.
projects.fullDescription: A faith-centered website designed to share religious events, community news, and streaming content with the congregation and visitors.
projects.overview: A modern church website to keep the community connected through events, news, and live streaming capabilities.
projects.problem: The church needed a single place to publish events, sermons, and stream services for both desktop and mobile users.
projects.solution: We delivered a fast, accessible Next.js site with integrated streaming, event calendar, and a clear content structure for easy updates.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We committed to accessibility, performance, and ease of content updates so the team could focus on their mission.

todayWork.title: Today's Work
todayWork.description: Regular content updates and feature additions for new streaming and event needs.
